querystring.select: SELECT AC.CUST_NAME AS MgmntShrholderName, AC.APP_CUST_ID AS AppCustId, ACCMS.APP_CUST_COMPANY_MGMNT_SHRHOLDER_ID AS AppCustCompanyMgmntShrholderId, ACCMS.MR_JOB_POSITION_CODE AS MrJobPositionCode, RM1.DESCR AS MrJobPositionCodeDesc, AC.CUST_NO AS CustNo, AC.MR_CUST_TYPE_CODE AS MrCustTypeCode, RM2.DESCR AS MrCustTypeCodeDesc
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL ACPS WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACPS.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_COMPANY ACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACC.APP_CUST_ID = AC.APP_CUST_ID JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_COMPANY_MGMNT_SHRHOLDER ACCMS WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACCMS.APP_CUST_ID = AC.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RM1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACCMS.MR_JOB_POSITION_CODE = RM1.MASTER_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RM2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.MR_CUST_TYPE_CODE = RM2.MASTER_CODE
querystring.where: WHERE AC.IS_SHAREHOLDER = 1 AND ACCMS.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND ACCMS.IS_SIGNER = 1 AND (RM1.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'JOB_POSITION' OR RM1.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE IS NULL) AND RM2.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'CUST_TYPE'
